de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index

Interface DistanceIndex<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Index, Result
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrecomputedDistanceMatrix

    public interface DistanceIndex<O>
extends Index
    Index with support for distance queries (e.g. precomputed distance matrixes, caches)
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DistanceQuery<O> getDistanceQuery(DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction, Object... hints)
      Get a KNN query object for the given distance query and k.

    • Method Detail

      • getDistanceQuery

        DistanceQuery<O> getDistanceQuery(DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction,
                                Object... hints)
        Get a KNN query object for the given distance query and k. This function MAY return null, when the given distance is not supported!
        Parameters:
        distanceFunction - Distance function to use.
        hints - Hints for the optimizer
        Returns:
        KNN Query object or null
